ai-tika-vin07t44:2_2: “As a portion,” he said: “This is the meaning of this,
ai-tika-vin07t44:2_3: With faith, source, and originating, they reckoned as an including, the source, and originating, and the source of the origin of worlds, namely, the source of mentioned, and of the aggregates, and of the origin of the necess, namely, clan, etc., that is called “with detail”.
ai-tika-vin07t44:2_4: she preferredicted the best perceptions, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-tika-vin07t44:2_6: How many kinds of offenses can be described for the sake of the non-offenses thus: “Where are you able to discern them?”
ai-tika-vin07t44:2_7: Shouldn’t there be such an individual essence, but who are not compelling whether of them or not?
ai-tika-vin07t44:2_8: of the observance-day procedure, etc., of the observance-day procedure,
ai-tika-vin07t44:3_0: The commentary on the questions is finished.
